# Draft:President Cory C. Aquino Boulevard

----
President Corazon C. Aquino Boulevard, also known as Cory C. Aquino Boulevard or Bagasbas Boulevard, is an 8.7-kilometer boulevard in the province of Camarines Norte, Philippines. It connects the municipalities of Mercedes, Daet, Talisay, and Vinzons.
The boulevard is noted as the longest boulevard in the Philippines. Originally named Bagasbas Boulevard, it was later renamed in honor of former president Corazon Aquino. The area is known for its food trucks and night-time vendors.
Route description
The boulevard begins at Delos Reyes Boulevard in Mercedes and extends north to Calangkawan Sur Road in Vinzons. A connecting bridge is under construction to extend the route further.
Key features
Notable points of interest along the boulevard include:
* Sabangan Beach in Mercedes
* Centennial Wharf in Daet
* Bagasbas Airport in Daet
* Bagasbas Lighthouse in Daet
* San Jose Beach in Talisay
